alert.note: Alert for Coastal Indian River; Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Indian River; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 11 at 8:29AM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...DENSE FOG CONTINUES ACROSS THE TREASURE COAST COUNTIES... At 830 AM, surface observations, satellite imagery, and traffic cameras continued to show dense fog in Indian River, Saint Lucie, and Martin counties. Fog was reducing visibility to to less than one mile, with locally dense fog reducing visibility to one quarter mile at times. This fog is expected to clear over the next hour or two. Motorists driving this morning in these locations should prepare to encounter rapidly decreasing visibility in fog. When driving in dense fog, reduce your speed, use only low beam headlights, and leave extra following distance between your vehicle and the one in front of you.
